function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c =="w" then set_stone( "st-glass", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "!" then abyss(i-1,line) elseif c=="z" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i-.5,line+.5, {player=0}) elseif c=="/" then mirrorp(i-1,line,TRUE,FALSE, 4) elseif c==";" then mirrorp(i-1,line,TRUE,FALSE, 2) elseif c=="L" then set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, TRUE, WEST), "name", "laser") elseif c=="U" then set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "laser2") elseif c=="V" then set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, FALSE, NORTH), "name", "laser3") elseif c=="G" then doorv( i-1,line, {name="door1"}) elseif c=="H" then doorv( i-1,line, {name="door2"}) elseif c=="u" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="on", target="laser2"}) elseif c=="v" then set_item("it-trigger", i-1,line, {action="on", target="laser3"}) elseif c=="g" then set_stone("st-switch", i-1,line, {action="openclose",target="door1"}) elseif c=="h" then set_stone("st-switch", i-1,line, {action="openclose",target="door2"}) end end end
function yy1( color, x, y) stone = format( "st-%s4", color) set_stone( stone, x, y) end
